consent.title: Facial Recognition Consent
consent.description: To find your photos, SnapRace will scan the geometry of the face in your selfie. For more details, please review our

metadata.privacyPolicyDescription: Learn how SnapRace collects, uses, and protects your personal information, including our biometric information policy for facial recognition services.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.p1: This Privacy Policy explains how we ("SnapRace," "we," "us," or "our") collect, use, and share information in connection with our photo identification and gallery services (the "Service"). Our mission is to help you, the participant, find your race photos quickly and easily.
section1.p2: This policy applies to the participants of events ("Events") organized by our clients, the race organizers ("Organizers").

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.eventPhotosDesc: We receive official event photos taken by or on behalf of the Organizer.
section2.participantDataDesc: We may receive limited data about you from the Organizer, such as your name and assigned bib number for the event.
section2.bibNumbersDesc: Our technology automatically scans event photos to detect and read bib numbers.
section2.biometricInfoDesc: When we process photos, our technology detects faces and creates a unique numeric representation of each face (a "face vector" or "embedding"). Please see our detailed Biometric Information Policy in Section 4 below.
section2.selfiesAndBibsDesc: If you use our selfie search feature, you provide us with a photo of yourself (a "selfie") and your bib number for a specific event.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.intro: We use the information we collect for one primary purpose: to provide and improve our Service. This includes:
section3.galleryDesc: To automatically identify and group all of your photos from an event into a personal gallery.
section3.linkingDesc: To associate photos with you via bib number detection and/or facial recognition.
section3.selfieSearchDesc: To allow you to find your photos by providing a selfie and bib number.
section3.improvingDesc: To enhance the accuracy of our photo identification technology.

section4.title: 4. Biometric Information Policy
section4.intro: Your trust is our priority. We are committed to handling your biometric information responsibly and transparently.
section4.whatWeCollectDesc: We collect a numeric representation of your facial geometry from event photos and any selfies you provide. We do not store your actual facial data. We do not collect or store scans of your eyes, fingerprints, or voice.
section4.purposeDesc: This facial geometry data is used exclusively to identify and group your race photos for a specific event. It is the key to finding photos where your bib number is not visible.
section4.consentDesc: Your consent to the collection and use of this biometric information is obtained by the Race Organizer through the event registration waiver you agree to when you sign up for the race.
section4.prohibitionDesc: We will never sell, lease, trade, or otherwise profit from your biometric information.
section4.retentionDesc: We will permanently destroy your biometric information from our systems upon the earlier of: (a) your request to delete your data, or (b) no more than three (3) years after our last interaction with you.

section5.title: 5. How We Share Your Information
section5.intro: We do not share your personal information with third parties except in the limited circumstances described below:
section5.withOrganizersDesc: We provide the final, organized photo galleries to the Organizer of the event you participated in.
section5.withProvidersDesc: We use trusted third-party vendors to provide the underlying technology for our service, such as cloud hosting and facial recognition APIs (e.g., Amazon Web Services). These vendors are contractually obligated to protect your data.
section5.forLegalDesc: We may share information if required by law or to protect the rights, property, or safety of SnapRace, our users, or the public.

section6.title: 6. Data Security
section6.content: We implement reasonable and appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. This includes data encryption at rest and in transit and strict access controls.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights and Choices
section7.intro: You have control over your information.
section7.accessPhotosDesc: You can access your photos through the gallery provided by your Race Organizer.
section7.deleteDataDesc: You have the right to request the deletion of your photos and any associated biometric information from our systems at any time. To do so, please contact us at
section7.deleteDataSuffix: with the event name, your name, and your bib number. We will process your request in a timely manner.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.content: Our Service is not directed to children under the age of 16, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from them. If we become aware that we have collected information from a child without parental consent, we will take steps to delete it.

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
section9.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

section10.title: 10. Contact Us
section10.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
